name: GitHubAppCreateIssueComment
description: Create a comment on a GitHub issue as a GitHub App (bot).
author: tdashworth

inputs.name: privateKey
inputs.label: Private Key File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The a private key for the GitHub App to act as.

inputs.name: appId
inputs.label: App Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The id of the GitHub App to act as.

inputs.name: repoOwner
inputs.label: Repository Owner
inputs.helpMarkDown: The owner of the repository to comment against. The app must be installed against that repository.

inputs.name: repoName
inputs.label: Repository Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the repository to comment against. The app must be installed against that repository.

inputs.name: issueId
inputs.label: Issue Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The id of issue/pull request to comment against.

inputs.name: body
inputs.label: Comment Body
inputs.helpMarkDown: The body of the comment. This can be in markdown format.
